entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 5:59PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Black Ice possible for portions of the Tennessee Valley... Lingering moisture from recent rain and a wintry mix, in combination with cold air moving into the region, has created patches of black ice on a number of area roadways, including some major highways. Bridges and overpasses, and roads that are in normally shaded areas or are on the north aspect of higher terrain are especially at risk.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 5:59PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Black Ice possible for portions of the Tennessee Valley... Lingering moisture from recent rain and a wintry mix, in combination with cold air moving into the region, has created patches of black ice on a number of area roadways, including some major highways. Bridges and overpasses, and roads that are in normally shaded areas or are on the north aspect of higher terrain are especially at risk.
